task_prefix: QSAR (Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationships) dataset for predicting chemical biodegradability. Contains 1055 chemicals characterized by 41 molecular descriptors to classify compounds as ready biodegradable or not ready biodegradable. Each example contains 41 features. Predict the target class.

column_descriptions.SpMax_L: Leading eigenvalue from Laplace matrix - represents the largest eigenvalue capturing molecular connectivity and branching patterns.
column_descriptions.J_Dz(e): Balaban-like index from Barysz matrix weighted by Sanderson electronegativity - measures molecular topology considering atomic electronegativity.
column_descriptions.nHM: Number of heavy atoms - count of all non-hydrogen atoms in the molecule.
column_descriptions.F01[N-N]: Frequency of N-N bonds at topological distance 1 - direct nitrogen-nitrogen bonds indicating hydrazine groups.
column_descriptions.F04[C-N]: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 4 - carbon-nitrogen connectivity separated by 3 bonds.
column_descriptions.NssssC: Number of atoms of type ssssC - quaternary carbon atoms (C bonded to 4 other atoms).
column_descriptions.nCb-: Number of substituted benzene C(sp2) - aromatic carbons in substituted benzene rings.
column_descriptions.C%: Percentage of carbon atoms - proportion of carbons relative to total atom count.
column_descriptions.nCp: Number of terminal primary C(sp3) - methyl groups and other terminal carbons.
column_descriptions.nO: Number of oxygen atoms - total count of oxygen atoms in the molecule.
column_descriptions.F03[C-N]: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-nitrogen pairs separated by 2 bonds.
column_descriptions.SdssC: Sum of dssC E-states - electrotopological state indices for sp2 carbons with two single bonds.
column_descriptions.HyWi_B(m): Hyper-Wiener-like index (log function) from Burden matrix weighted by mass - molecular size and branching descriptor.
column_descriptions.LOC: Lopping centric index - measures molecular centrality and branching patterns.
column_descriptions.SM6_L: Spectral moment of order 6 from Laplace matrix - higher-order molecular connectivity descriptor.
column_descriptions.F03[C-O]: Frequency of C-O bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-oxygen pairs separated by 2 bonds.
column_descriptions.Me: Mean atomic Sanderson electronegativity scaled on carbon atom - average electronegativity of the molecule.
column_descriptions.Mi: Mean first ionization potential scaled on carbon atom - average energy to remove electrons.
column_descriptions.nN-N: Number of N hydrazines - count of hydrazine functional groups (N-N bonds).
column_descriptions.nArNO2: Number of aromatic nitro groups - nitro groups attached to aromatic rings.
column_descriptions.nCRX3: Number of CRX3 groups - carbon atoms bonded to one R group and three halogens.
column_descriptions.SpPosA_B(p): Normalized spectral positive sum from Burden matrix weighted by polarizability - molecular polarizability descriptor.
column_descriptions.nCIR: Number of circuits - count of molecular rings/cycles in the structure.
column_descriptions.B01[C-Br]: Presence/absence of C-Br bonds at topological distance 1 - direct carbon-bromine bonds.
column_descriptions.B03[C-Cl]: Presence/absence of C-Cl bonds at topological distance 3 - carbon-chlorine pairs separated by 2 bonds.
column_descriptions.N-073: Ar2NH / Ar3N / Ar2N-Al / R..N..R - specific nitrogen-containing substructures.
column_descriptions.SpMax_A: Leading eigenvalue from adjacency matrix (Lovasz-Pelikan index) - molecular connectivity measure.
column_descriptions.Psi_i_1d: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index type 1d - atomic-level connectivity descriptor.
column_descriptions.B04[C-Br]: Presence/absence of C-Br bonds at topological distance 4 - carbon-bromine pairs separated by 3 bonds.
column_descriptions.SdO: Sum of dO E-states - electrotopological state indices for oxygen atoms.
column_descriptions.TI2_L: Second Mohar index from Laplace matrix - graph-theoretical molecular descriptor.
column_descriptions.nCrt: Number of ring tertiary C(sp3) - tertiary carbons within ring structures.
column_descriptions.C-026: R--CX--R substructure - carbon bonded to heteroatom X and two R groups.
column_descriptions.F02[C-N]: Frequency of C-N bonds at topological distance 2 - carbon-nitrogen pairs separated by 1 bond.
column_descriptions.nHDon: Number of hydrogen bond donor atoms - nitrogen and oxygen atoms capable of donating H-bonds.
column_descriptions.SpMax_B(m): Leading eigenvalue from Burden matrix weighted by mass - mass-weighted connectivity descriptor.
column_descriptions.Psi_i_A: Intrinsic state pseudoconnectivity index type S average - averaged atomic connectivity measure.
column_descriptions.nN: Number of nitrogen atoms - total count of nitrogen atoms in the molecule.
column_descriptions.SM6_B(m): Spectral moment of order 6 from Burden matrix weighted by mass - higher-order mass-weighted descriptor.
column_descriptions.nArCOOR: Number of aromatic esters - ester groups attached to aromatic rings.
column_descriptions.nX: Number of halogen atoms - total count of F, Cl, Br, I atoms.

class_description: Classes: 'RB' (Ready Biodegradable - chemicals that degrade rapidly under aerobic conditions (356 instances, 33.7%)), 'NRB' (Not Ready Biodegradable - chemicals that do not degrade readily in the environment (699 instances, 66.3%))
